sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L2_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L4_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

scripts.text:
UPDATE pipeline_control
SET last_run_status = 'FAILED',
    last_run_time = GETDATE()
WHERE table_name = 'orders';

UPDATE pipeline_control
SET last_watermark = (
    SELECT MAX(last_updated_ts) FROM orders
),
last_run_status = 'SUCCESS',
last_run_time = GETDATE()
WHERE table_name = 'orders';
